issue.title: [CF 1034] .Lua conditions (Quick Question)
issue.body:
Quick Question..

How do I add a .lua condition to check if unit has magic or a disease debuff?

Here's what i wanna do: https://imgur.com/8Vg2ffp


> Posted by CurseForge user alexlol95 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1034 | Raw

comments.body:
Attachment Added: hello.png

hello.png

<p>help</p>


> Posted by CurseForge user alexlol95

Create a buff/debuff icon to track "Magic; Disease". No reason to use Lua conditions for this.

If you really do need it as a condition on an icon, use an Icon Shown condition referring to that icon.

Edited Nov 21, 2014

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

@Cybeloras: Go

The icon tracks crowd control, fears, stuns and shattered, I want to know when I can purify crowd control effects from, lets say a tank. And I can't purify all CC effects so I want the icon to show when there is something to purify.

Thats why i have to check if the debuff is a magic effect

Edited Nov 22, 2014

> Posted by CurseForge user alexlol95
